channel.title: Local News | Austin | Spectrum News 1
channel.description: Your source for South Texas news from Spectrum News Austin.

item.title: Cold front brings chilly changes
item.description: A slow-moving cold front is set to bring rain and much cooler air on Wednesday.
item.author: Meteorologist Mary Wasson

item.title: Free entrance to Texas state parks Nov. 14 in honor of Veterans Day
item.description: Daily entrance fees at all parks on Sunday Nov. 14.
item.author: Sunny Tsai
item.ticker: Free entrance to Texas state parks Nov. 14 in honor of Veterans Day

item.title: Gov. Abbott calls for crackdown on 'pornography,' 'inappropriate content' in Texas schools
item.description: Gov. Abbott joins Krause's campaign to investigate books that cover race, gender identity and sexual orientation in public schools.
item.author: Associated Press
item.ticker: Gov. Abbott calls for crackdown on 'pornography,' 'inappropriate content' in Texas schools
